name: Grayscale Jump
description:
Description

a pretty basic highscore game

you have to stay inside the boundaries of the window

while the evil square tries to push you out of the window

you are only allowed to jump ten times

see how long you can survive

Controls

smiley face button is play

click with mouse to jump

X button to exit

Credits

Programming: me

Art: me

Sfx: me

pretty much everything: me

sfx made with jsfxr: https://sfxr.me/

font is Pixel Gosub: https://www.fontspace.com/pixel-gosub-font-f18590

(vry good font, i recommend)
